text:
किस तरह छोड़ दूँ तुम्हें जाना, तुम मेरी ज़िंदगी की आदत हो,
दास्ताँ ख़त्म होने वाली है, तुम मेरी आख़िरी मोहब्बत हो।
author: जौन एलिया

text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Dream big. Start small. Act now.
author: Daily Quotes

text: Hard days build strong people.

text: Sometimes silence speaks louder than words.

text: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.

text: Your habits shape your future.

text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.

text: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.

text: Fear kills more dreams than failure ever will.

text: Discipline is choosing what you want most over what you want now.

text: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

text: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

text: Stars can’t shine without darkness.

text: Make each day your masterpiece.

text: What we think, we become.

text: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.

text: Stay focused and never give up.

text: Your mindset determines your success.

text: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

text: Pain makes you stronger.
author: Daily Quotes

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

text: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

text: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
author: Daily Quotes

text: Success starts with self-belief.

text: Broken hearts still beat.

text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
author: Socrates

text: Love recognizes no barriers.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.

text: Small progress is still progress.

text: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.

text: You define your own life.

text: Sometimes memories hurt more than reality.

text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.

text: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.

text: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.

text: Love is not about possession, it's about appreciation.

text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated daily.

text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

text: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.

text: Behind every strong person is a story that gave them no choice.

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

text: Stay patient and trust your journey.
author: Daily Quotes

text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.

text: Sometimes the wrong choices bring us to the right places.

text: The best revenge is massive success.

text: Growth begins when comfort ends.

text: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.

text: Sometimes goodbye is a second chance.

text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.

text: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.

text: True love stories never have endings.

text: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.

text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.

text: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.

text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

text: Love is friendship set on fire.

text: Sometimes strength is quietly surviving another day.

text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.

text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.

text: Where there is love, there is hope.

text: Sometimes the strongest people are the ones who love beyond all faults.

text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

text: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.

text: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

text: Tears come from the heart, not from the brain.

text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.

text: Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.

text: Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
author: Karl Menninger

text: Some scars never fade, they just teach you strength.

text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference.

text: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.

text: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.

text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

text: Life is too important to be taken seriously.

text: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.

text: Sometimes the pain changes people.

text: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.

text: Success is the best proof of hard work.

text: Life is really about how much you can take and keep fighting.

text: Love is the bridge between you and everything.

text: Behind every smile is a story you may never understand.

text: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.

text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

text: If you can dream it, you can do it.

text: Love recognizes no rules.

text: Sometimes you need to step outside, get some air, and remind yourself who you are.

text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.

text: Turn your can’t into can and your dreams into plans.

text: Love is a better teacher than duty.

text: Tears are words the heart can't express.

text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

text: Life becomes easier when you learn to accept what you can’t control.

text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.

text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
